text: Wanlong is a metro station on the Songshan-Xindian Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code is G06. == Station layout information == The platforms are located underground. Platform 1 is for Songshan and Platform 2 is for Xindian. == Around the station == * Zhiqing Elementary School * Wugong Elementary School * Wanfu Elementary School * Taipei Public Library - Jingmei Branch * Maintenance Office (between this station and Jingmei station) * Chin Chang Elementary School * Taipei Pot Plant Auction Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Wanlong metro station
